attributes.action: do everything he can to stop the closure of more than 200 HMRC offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Governments so called scheme to close 200 offices to try and save money and provide better serives to the public is an absolute disgrace! At a time when unemployment is at its highest they want to go and make a further 12,500 people unemployed! 

I think the Government needs to realise that job cuts will not make the service to the public more efficient.
